description:
Invixium, iProov, ISS, and Privy look to accelerate growth and expand market presence by adding experience to their executive teams as biometrics and digital identity industry groups Open Identity Exchange and Secure Technology Association each name new directors.

Secure Technology Association names ED

The Secure Technology Alliance (STA) has appointed Christina Hulka its new Executive Director. Hulka most recently served as executive director and chief operating officer of FIDO Alliance. Hulka succeeds Jason Bohrer in leading the association, and the related U.S. Payment
title: Invixium, iProov, ISS, Privy hire to expand market presence
